list.title: Ambulance Extra
list.descriptions: An emergency ambulance is a specialized vehicle equipped with medical equipment and staffed by trained paramedics. It responds quickly to emergencies, providing immediate care and transporting patients to hospitals.

list.title: Ambulance Plus
list.descriptions: Transfer patients from one hospital to another quickly, at low cost, and conveniently for the user. With the transfer, you can go to specialized hospitals near your home.

list.title: Ambulance F
list.descriptions: With Ambulance F, we can cremate the body and transport it back to your family in a dignified and courteous manner, the above price includes all additional costs.

list.title: Ambulance Staria
list.descriptions: Another Ambulance Extra is a specialized vehicle equipped with medical equipment and staffed by a trained doctor. It responds quickly to emergencies, providing immediate care and transporting patients to the hospital.

list.title: Ambulance X
list.descriptions: It is a high-tech ambulance that takes advantage of the terrain and surrounding events to produce the most optimal results in rescuing victims and calculating the fastest movement.

list.title: Ambulance A+
list.descriptions: Medical applications of aircraft and rapid response teams include rescue, relief, rapid transport of large quantities of supplies, equipment and necessities multi-provincial and multinational.

list.title: Gaz Ambulance
list.descriptions: Providing ambulance services, and supporting the transportation of patients domestically and internationally. Providing medical services for conferences, seminars, events, cultural and social activities (art programs, live music and dance shows, festivals, exhibitions, fairs, etc.); sports activities, etc..
